summary: You can digitize your families favorite books and include as many readers as are willing to record themselves.

ariaLabel.collapsed: open the opening the book builder section
ariaLabel.expanded: collapse the opening the book builder section

messages.1: From the "Reading Corner" page, you can access the "Book Builder" by pressing the (+) button at the bottom-right of the screen.
messages.2: From there press the "create a book" option.

messages.1: From any page, you can access the "Book Builder" via the hamburger menu at the top-left of the screen.
messages.2: From there press the "Book Builder" option.

ariaLabel.collapsed: open the using the book builder section
ariaLabel.expanded: collapse the using the book builder section

messages.1: In the "Book Builder", you will be able to specify several attributes related to the book.
messages.2: The title of the book, several images, source information, delays, readers and pages can all be specified here.

messages.1: Images can be either captured using your devices camera, or they can be loaded from your gallery.
messages.2: When an image has been selected, it can be edited to ensure it looks the best that it can.
messages.3: Pressing on an existing image will bring up the image buttons.

messages.1: Source information can be provided about the book.
messages.2: While this source information is optional, it can help keep track of your favorite stories.

messages.1: Delays can be defined which will affect the playback of the book.
messages.2: These delays can ensure that audio playback doesn't sound too abrupt.

messages.1: When a book is being auto-played, a specific sound can be played when a page completes and the next page is ready to begin.
messages.2: A set of predefined sounds can be selected or a custom sound can be uploaded or recorded.

messages.1: A book can contain any number of readers.
messages.2: Each reader will record themselves reading each page of the book and thus will be available to read the book during book playback.

messages.1: A book must contain at least 1 page, but has no upper limit.
messages.2: When capturing or uploading an image to be used for a page, AI will be used to extract the text from the image. This will make recording much easier for the readers.

messages.1: When all of the fields of a book have been filled-out, the book must be saved to the device.
messages.2: Upon saving, the book data will be checked to make sure that it is all valid; any errors will be highlighted.
